channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Scarlett Johansson v. OpenAI Could Look Like in Court
item.description: If Scarlett Johansson pursues legal action against OpenAI for giving ChatGPT a voice she calls “eerily similar to mine,” she might claim the company b...

item.title: Oyo, once valued at $10 billion, shelves IPO plans for second time
item.description: India's Oyo, once valued at $10 billion, has withdrawn its IPO application from the market regulator for the second time. © 2024 TechCrunch. All right...

item.title: A Far-Right Indian News Site Posts Racist Conspiracies. US Tech Firms Are Profiting From It
item.description: OpIndia claims "Islamophobia does not exist." A new report shared exclusively with WIRED finds Google's programmatic ads are running next to its conte...

item.title: Ore Energy emerges from stealth to build utility-scale batteries that last days, not hours
item.description: Where Aytac Yilmaz lives in the Netherlands, the sun might not appear for days on end, which can really crimp the output of the country’s solar panels...

item.title: Local Coworking Spaces Thrive Where WeWork Dared Not Go
item.description: A disused church, a school, and a motorcycle garage are among the hyperlocal new coworking spaces cropping up to offer remote workers a place to go.

item.title: Paytm warns of job cuts as losses swell after RBI clampdown
item.description: Paytm, a leading financial services firm in India, said its net loss widened in the fourth quarter as it grappled with a regulatory clampdown. © 2024 ...

item.title: We Stood on Both Sides of the New York–Dublin Portal and It Was Glorious
item.description: Hundreds of people and two WIRED reporters gathered at the Portal, which is open again after being closed due to “inappropriate behavior.”

item.title: In Seoul summit, heads of states and companies commit to AI safety
item.description: Government officials and AI industry executives agreed on Tuesday to apply elementary safety measures in the fast-moving field and establish an intern...

item.title: /e/OS Review: This Operating System Is Better Than Android. You Should Try It
item.description: Even if you aren’t technically inclined, this privacy-first mobile operating system helps you escape surveillance capitalism.

item.title: Microsoft wants to make Windows an AI operating system, launches Copilot+ PCs
item.description: Copilot, Microsoft's brand of generative AI, will soon be far more deeply integrated into the Windows 11 experience. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights res...
